AqdiqtyEByOq Buva#dvadByaScaqruM nirva#pEqdBUti#kAma AdiqtyA vA EqtaM BUtyaiq prati# nudantEq yO&laqM BUtyaiq san BUtiqM na prAqpnOtyA#diqtyAnEqva Buva#dvataqH svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq ta EqvainaqM BUti#M gamayantiq Bava#tyEqvA 
&&diqtyEByO# dhAqraya#dvad-ByaScaqruM nirva#pEqdapa#ruddhO vA&paruqddhyamA#nO vA&&diqtyA vA a#parOqddhAra# AdiqtyA a#vagamayiqtAra# AdiqtyAnEqva dhAqraya#dvataqH - [  ]  1
